tc_example1.c

00001 /*This file is prepared for Doxygen automatic documentation generation.*/
00104 #include <avr32/io.h>
00105 #include "compiler.h"
00106 #include "board.h"
00107 #include "pm.h"
00108 #include "gpio.h"
00109 #include "tc.h"
00110 
00111 
00114 
00115 #if BOARD == EVK1100
00116 #  define EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_ID         0
00117 #  define EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_PIN        AVR32_TC_A0_0_PIN
00118 #  define EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_FUNCTION   AVR32_TC_A0_0_FUNCTION
00119 // Note that TC_A0_0 pin is pin 55(PB23) on AT32UC3A0512 QFP144.
00120 #elif BOARD == EVK1101
00121 #  define EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_ID         0
00122 #  define EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_PIN        AVR32_TC_A0_0_0_PIN
00123 #  define EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_FUNCTION   AVR32_TC_A0_0_0_FUNCTION
00124 // Note that TC_A0_0_0 pin is pin 32(PB00) on AT32UC3B0256 QFP64.
00125 #endif
00127 
00128 
00131 int main(void)
00132 {
00133   // The timer/counter instance and channel number are used in several functions.
00134   // It's defined as local variable for ease-of-use causes and readability.
00135   volatile avr32_tc_t *tc = &AVR32_TC;
00136 
00137   // Options for waveform genration.
00138   tc_waveform_opt_t waveform_opt =
00139   {
00140     .channel  = EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_ID,        // Channel selection.
00141 
00142     .bswtrg   = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,           // Software trigger effect on TIOB.
00143     .beevt    = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,           // External event effect on TIOB.
00144     .bcpc     = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,           // RC compare effect on TIOB.
00145     .bcpb     = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,           // RB compare effect on TIOB.
00146 
00147     .aswtrg   = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,           // Software trigger effect on TIOA.
00148     .aeevt    = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,           // External event effect on TIOA.
00149     .acpc     = TC_EVT_EFFECT_TOGGLE,         // RC compare effect on TIOA: toggle.
00150     .acpa     = TC_EVT_EFFECT_TOGGLE,         // RA compare effect on TIOA: toggle (other possibilities are none, set and clear).
00151 
00152     .wavsel   = TC_WAVEFORM_SEL_UP_MODE,      // Waveform selection: Up mode without automatic trigger on RC compare.
00153     .enetrg   = FALSE,                        // External event trigger enable.
00154     .eevt     = TC_EXT_EVENT_SEL_TIOB_INPUT,  // External event selection.
00155     .eevtedg  = TC_SEL_NO_EDGE,               // External event edge selection.
00156     .cpcdis   = FALSE,                        // Counter disable when RC compare.
00157     .cpcstop  = FALSE,                        // Counter clock stopped with RC compare.
00158 
00159     .burst    = TC_BURST_NOT_GATED,           // Burst signal selection.
00160     .clki     = TC_CLOCK_RISING_EDGE,         // Clock inversion.
00161     .tcclks   = TC_CLOCK_SOURCE_TC2           // Internal source clock 2.
00162   };
00163 
00164   // Switch main clock to external oscillator 0 (crystal).
00165   pm_switch_to_osc0(&AVR32_PM, FOSC0, OSC0_STARTUP);
00166 
00167   // Assign I/O to timer/counter channel pin & function.
00168   gpio_enable_module_pin(EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_PIN, EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_FUNCTION);
00169 
00170   // Initialize the timer/counter.
00171   tc_init_waveform(tc, &waveform_opt);  // Initialize the timer/counter waveform.
00172 
00173   // Set the compare triggers.
00174   tc_write_ra(tc, EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_ID, 0x0600);     // Set RA value.
00175   tc_write_rc(tc, EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_ID, 0x2000);     // Set RC value.
00176 
00177   // Start the timer/counter.
00178   tc_start(tc, EXAMPLE_TC_CHANNEL_ID);
00179 
00180   while (TRUE);
00181 }
